info.title: Authentication API
info.description: API for user authentication, including login, password reset request, OTP verification, and password reset.

post.description: Sends a one-time password (OTP) to the user’s mobile number and returns user status.
Verifies the OTP sent to the user’s mobile and generates a JWT token, returning user details.
Submits or updates student details for a user with the "student" role.
